trstarlight.skill.light_remains.descript: §oConcentrate your eyes on darkness, for only amidst dark shall there be light.
trstarlight.skill.echo_endures.descripti: §oConcentrate your ears on silence, for only in silence is the word.
trstarlight.skill.life_returns.descripti: §oConcentrate your thoughts on death, for only in dying is life.
trstarlight.skill.ember_remains.descript: §oConcentrate your will upon resistance, for only unyielding fire endures the dark.
trstarlight.skill.current_unbroken.descr: §oConcentrate your potential upon stillness, for only energy that does not act may never be undone.
trstarlight.skill.shape_forgotten.descri: §oConcentrate your body upon fracture, for only broken forms learn to adapt.
trstarlight.skill.vestiges_of_eidolons.d: §oWhat fades does not vanish. What is gone still lingers. It listens to silence, and weaves truth from what remains.
§oMotion is born from pause. Form is sculpted in collapse. What was power is no longer force — but continuity, shaped through pressure and will.
trstarlight.generic.spawnpoint_not_locat: Failed to locate spawnpoint, if issue persist after sleeping, contact Dev of TRStarlight.
trstarlight.generic.skill.unique.evoluti: Unique Skill %1$s will now undergo evolution.
trstarlight.generic.skill.ultimate.evolu: Ultimate Skill %1$s will now undergo evolution.
